001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.drivebase;
002
003import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
004
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
006import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
007
008import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.Motor;
009
010/** Class for mecanum/xdrive drivebases
011 * @author Alex Stedman
012 * @param <T> The motor type for the subsystem
013 */
014public class MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends DrivebaseSubsystem<T> {
015    /** Drive motors
016     *
017     */
018    public Motor<T> flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor;
019
020    /** Create mecanum drivebase
021     *
022     * @param flMotor The front left motor for the drivebase
023     * @param frMotor The front right motor for the drivebase
024     * @param rlMotor The rear left motor for the drivebase
025     * @param rrMotor The rear right motor for the drivebase
026     */
027    public MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem(Motor<T> flMotor, Motor<T> frMotor, Motor<T> rlMotor, Motor<T> rrMotor) {
028        super(flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor);
029        this.flMotor = flMotor;
030        this.frMotor = frMotor;
031        this.rlMotor = rlMotor;
032        this.rrMotor = rrMotor;
033    }
034
035    /** Create mecanum drivebase
036     *
037     * @param gyro The gyro supplier
038     * @param flMotor The front left motor for the drivebase
039     * @param frMotor The front right motor for the drivebase
040     * @param rlMotor The rear left motor for the drivebase
041     * @param rrMotor The rear right motor for the drivebase
042     */
043    public MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem(
044            DoubleSupplier gyro, Motor<T> flMotor, Motor<T> frMotor, Motor<T> rlMotor, Motor<T> rrMotor) {
045        super(gyro, flMotor, frMotor, rlMotor, rrMotor);
046        this.flMotor = flMotor;
047        this.frMotor = frMotor;
048        this.rlMotor = rlMotor;
049        this.rrMotor = rrMotor;
050    }
051
052    public void joystickDrive(double x, double y, double rotation) {
053        joystickDriveWithGyro(x, y, rotation, 0);
054    }
055
056    public void joystickDriveWithGyro(double x, double y, double rotation, double gyroAngle) {
057        double speed = Range.clip(Math.abs(Math.hypot(x, y)), 0, 1);
058        double headingRad = Math.toRadians(gyroAngle);
059        double angle = -Math.atan2(y, x) + headingRad - Math.PI / 4;
060        drive(speed, angle, rotation);
061    }
062
063    public void drive(double speed, double angle, double rotation) {
064        double x = Math.cos(angle) * speed;
065        double y = Math.sin(angle) * speed;
066
067        double powerCompY = -(x + y);
068        double powerCompX = x - y;
069
070        speed = Range.clip(speed + Math.abs(rotation), 0, 1);
071
072        double flPower = powerCompY - powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
073        double frPower = -powerCompY - powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
074        double rlPower = powerCompY + powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
075        double rrPower = -powerCompY + powerCompX - 2 * rotation;
076
077        double scale = getScale(flPower, frPower, rlPower, rrPower);
078        scale = scale == 0 ? 0 : speed / scale;
079        scale = Math.cbrt(scale);
080        drive(flPower * scale, frPower * scale, rlPower * scale, rrPower * scale);
081    }
082
083    public void stop() {
084        drive(0, 0, 0, 0);
085    }
086
087    public void drive(double flSpeed, double frSpeed, double rlSpeed, double rrSpeed) {
088        flMotor.setSpeed(flSpeed * getSpeed());
089        frMotor.setSpeed(frSpeed * getSpeed());
090        rlMotor.setSpeed(rlSpeed * getSpeed());
091        rrMotor.setSpeed(rrSpeed * getSpeed());
092    }
093}
